Thanks for this, @ArushiSinghal!

We already have issues related to linking to the teams app here and here that have more broadly to do with restructuring the website, so I'll go ahead and close this.

body:
Thanks for this, @ArushiSinghal! 

We already have issues related to linking to the teams app [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/summer-of-code/issues/97) and [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/summer-of-code/issues/439) that have more broadly to do with restructuring the website, so I'll go ahead and close this.
